text: Malaykâ taamoomik hebeltô taama matakka, abeenim kee aboonuwaanam inkih Yalli keenik yaaxige Ķaa akke waytek, kaadu Qhiyaamah ayró shafaaqatta numuh mayakkan Yalli shafaaqattat kak leedaah kah oggola mara (moominiin kinnuk) akke waytek, kaadu usun Kay meesih Kay amri cinaanamak cibbarsimaah meesita mara kinnon
